title: Evelyn Tsang
text:
Hello!
I am a third-year undergraduate at the University of California, Santa Barbara, studying Environmental Studies & Earth Science.;.｡🌱..
⊹₊ ˚‧︵‿₊୨ ᰔ ୧₊‿︵‧ ˚ ₊⊹


Current Projects
🗻 Undergraduate Research Assistant at the Benioff Lab
Working with Dr. Hillary Young on a snow microplastic analysis project in the Eastern Sierra Nevada mountains – How winter sports contribute to plastic pollution.
🌊 Tide and Terra Magazine
In collaboration with Sanjana Sujeet. “TnT” is an artistic initiative aimed at highlighting sustainability within our local campus community at UCSB and Isla Vista, and beyond. This project is currently being funded by the ELI Program. You can read more in the My Projects tab, or visit the social media to stay updated!
⊹₊ ˚‧︵‿₊୨ ᰔ ୧₊‿︵‧ ˚ ₊⊹

title: About Me
text:
I grew up in the PNW and moved to the Central Coast to attend UCSB, escape the rain, and bask my days in the sun.
I’m passionate about conservation science, marine biology, and climate outreach and education with experience working in research labs + non-profits.
Outside of academics, I’m interested in learning new recipes, traditional arts, and UI/UX design!

Check out what I’ve been up to recently:

You can also find my resume here
